DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the Pharmacokinetics of Product 0405 in the Treatment of Atopic Dermatitis in Adolescent Subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Determine the Pharmacokinetics of Product 0405
DOC.detailed_description: Treament medication will be administered topically twice daily for 28 days.
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of Atopic Dermatitis Good health with the exception of Atopic Dermatitis Percent body surface area minimums Subject who are nursing, pregnant or planning a pregnancy
